badges.tokensAcross: Use tokens across courses and AI

hero.title: One balance for courses and AI strategies.
hero.subtitle: Load a token balance once and use it across Avenqor: structured PDF courses, custom courses and AI-generated strategies. Or pay directly for a single course if you prefer.

bullets.oneBalance: One balance for Forex, Crypto and Binary content.
bullets.payWithTokens: Pay with tokens or direct in EUR, GBP, USD or AED.
bullets.topUpAnytime: Top up any time – tokens do not expire.

exampleRate.title: Example effective rate
exampleRate.subtitle: For visual purposes only
exampleRate.description: In production, token pricing will be defined per region and currency. Here we simply show how packs and custom top-ups could work inside the interface.
exampleRate.example: For example: <tokens>{tokens}</tokens> might correspond to approximately <price>{price}</price> (or regional equivalent), but final values will be defined in legal terms and payment settings.

tokenPacks.title: Token packs.
tokenPacks.subtitle: Start small or commit for longer – each pack loads tokens into your Avenqor balance for use across courses and AI.
tokenPacks.note: Currency shown here is illustrative. Final pricing may differ.
tokenPacks.info: Exact token conversion will be defined in production.

customTopUp.title: Custom top-up
customTopUp.subtitle: Set any amount in your preferred currency. In production, the system converts it to tokens automatically.
customTopUp.minAmount: Minimum 0.01 in any supported currency. No formal maximum – larger top-ups are simply converted into more tokens.

directPayment.title: Pay directly for a single course
directPayment.subtitle: If you prefer not to manage a balance, you can pay for individual courses or custom PDFs directly in your currency.

bullets.currencies: Use EUR, GBP, USD or AED depending on your region.
bullets.noTokens: Tokens are not required – direct payment simply unlocks that specific product.
bullets.convertLater: In future, you can always convert to a token-based workflow if you prefer.

howTokensWork.title: How tokens work inside Avenqor.
howTokensWork.subtitle: A simple balance that powers both structured courses and AI-based tools.

step1.title: Add tokens
step1.description: Buy a pack or set a custom top-up using your preferred currency.

step2.title: Use tokens on content
step2.description: Spend tokens on ready-made courses, custom PDFs and AI strategies.

step3.title: Track in your dashboard
step3.description: See balance, usage and history – including which products used how many tokens.

step4.title: Top up when needed
step4.description: Tokens do not expire, so you can top up at your own pace when the balance gets low.

riskNotice.title: Important risk and token notice.
riskNotice.paragraph1: Trading Forex, Crypto and Binary options is highly speculative and can lead to substantial or total loss of capital. Tokens, courses and AI outputs on Avenqor are for educational purposes only. They do not contain financial advice or trading signals.
riskNotice.paragraph2: Tokens themselves are a way to access digital educational content inside Avenqor. They are not a separate financial product or investment. Token pricing, refund rules and any region-specific limitations will be defined in the final Terms & Conditions and Risk & Disclaimer.

cta.title: Ready to load your first balance?
cta.subtitle: Start with a small pack or custom top-up. You can always switch to a different approach later – your focus stays on structured learning.
